arts.ttl: FA Cup fourth round draw in full as Wigan, Orient and Preston progress
arts.sum: The fourth round draw of the FA Cup is finally complete after the final three teams progressed on Tuesday night. Wigan Athletic will take on Fulham after they defeated Mansfield Town 2-0 away, while Preston North End will host Wycombe Wanderers after they beat Charlton Athletic 2-1 at home. League one side Leyton Orient overcame […] The post FA Cup fourth round draw in full as Wigan, Orient and Preston progress first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Nathan Jones after narrow FA Cup exit at Preston: Charlton Athletic have a ‘Championship level’ squad
arts.sum: “It doesn’t happen to us, normally we’re very good defensively Then we didn’t start the half well, conceded from a corner, don’t deal with the first ball, don’t win the header, don’t deal with the first ball, give a corner away, and then don’t deal with that. But I think we’ve got a Championship-level squad, I really do.

arts.ttl: Osmajic's double guides Preston past Charlton
arts.sum: Watch the highlights as Milutin Osmajic's double helps Preston beat Charlton 2-1 in the FA Cup third round.

arts.ttl: Milutin Osmajic scores twice to seal Preston’s spot in FA Cup fourth round
arts.sum: The Montenegro striker scored in the 32nd and 47th minute with Luke Berry temporarily levelling the scores with a 40th-minute strike.
